summary: The script demonstrates how to build a parametric cyclic sector model of a bladed disc, execute a modal analysis on the sector using MAPDL launched as a service, post‑process the results with the MAPDL reader, and reconstruct a full cyclic model for visualization with PyVista.
business_intent: Provide engineers and analysts with a practical example of performing cyclic (rotating machinery) analysis in ANSYS MAPDL, illustrating parametric geometry creation, modal extraction, result handling, and visualization workflows.
